Translations.Text: tatha jinhonne kaha ki ham nasaara (eesaee) hain, hamane unase (bhee) drdh vachan liya tha, to unhen jis baat ka nirdesh diya gaya tha, use bhula baithe, to pralay ke din tak ke lie hamane unake beech shatruta tatha paarasparik (aapasee) vidvesh bhadaka diya aur sheeghr hee allaah jo kuchh ve karate rahe hain, unhen[1] bata dega

he ahle kitaab! tumhaare paas hamaare rasool aa gaye hain[1], jo tumhaare lie un bahut see baaton ko ujaagar kar rahe hain, jinhen tum chhupa rahe the aur bahut see baaton ko chhod bhee rahe hain. ab tumhaare paas allaah kee or se prakaash tatha khulee pustak (kuraan) aa gaee hai

jisake dvaara allaah unhen shaanti ka maarg dikha raha hai, jo usakee prasannata par chalate hon, unhen apanee anumati se andheron se nikaalakar prakaash kee or le jaata hai aur unhen supath dikhaata hai

nishchay ve kaafir[1] ho gaye, jinhonne kaha ki maryam ka putr maseehî€¼ hee allaah hai. (he nabee!) unase kah do ki yadi allalaah maryam ke putr aur usakee maata tatha jo bhee dharatee mein hai, sabaka vinaash kar dena chaahe, to kisamen shakti hai ki vah use rok de? tatha aakaash aur dharatee aur jo bhee inake beech hai, sab allaah hee ka raajy hai, vah jo chaahe, utapann karata hai tatha vah jo chaahe, kar sakata hai
